Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of Anba Abraam Bishop of Fayoum:

Text.Language: Wouniatk qen oumeym/i: peniwt e#y#u# n~dikeoc: abba Abraam pie~pickopoc: pimenrit n~te P,#c#.
Blessed are you indeed, our holy and righteous father, Abba Abraam the bishop, the beloved of Christ.
